snippet.textDisplay: The only thing that bothered me about this fight was how very easy it was to dodge/counter the attacks. But besides from that it was amazing. And I really have no idea how many times I fought against the final bosses because of this great music

snippet.textDisplay: +fate255, incase you haven't played it yet, the final boss is a villain named Fawful who has combined with the Dark Star, and ancient living item with the power to consume the world in darkness and despair, something literally made of raw evil, the dark star copied bowser and changed into Dark Bowser, and fawful wanted to control the dark star so he combined with the core of the dark star, and you get to play as bowser fighting dark bowser and after that you get to play as mario and luigi fight the core of the dark star and fawful witch was turned into a disturbing bug like thing with a huge freaky smile.
snippet.textOriginal: +fate255, incase you haven't played it yet, the final boss is a villain named Fawful who has combined with the Dark Star, and ancient living item with the power to consume the world in darkness and despair, something literally made of raw evil, the dark star copied bowser and changed into Dark Bowser, and fawful wanted to control the dark star so he combined with the core of the dark star, and you get to play as bowser fighting dark bowser and after that you get to play as mario and luigi fight the core of the dark star and fawful witch was turned into a disturbing bug like thing with a huge freaky smile.

snippet.textDisplay: Oh gosh, you're only about the third person I've met that was as disappointed with this game as I was. I did dislike Bowser in this game as well. His gameplay consisted of "RAAAAH I'M SO STRONG HEY THERE'S A ROCK LET'S PUNCH IT OH NO ANOTHER ROCK LET'S PUNCH THAT TOO". Plus, having just one controllable character in battle is boring.
snippet.textOriginal: Oh gosh, you're only about the third person I've met that was as disappointed with this game as I was. I did dislike Bowser in this game as well. His gameplay consisted of "RAAAAH I'M SO STRONG HEY THERE'S A ROCK LET'S PUNCH IT OH NO ANOTHER ROCK LET'S PUNCH THAT TOO". Plus, having just one controllable character in battle is boring.

snippet.textDisplay: Personally, I think Nintendo went wrong with this entire game. Like seriously, Mario and Luigi in his belly? What happened to the classic Mario & Luigi? Why can't we go back to that instead of changing all of this crap up? For me, the Babies ruined Partners in Time and for this one the entire story and not having M&L as the main characters kind of ruins it. If your going to make Bowser a playable character, DO IT RIGHT! Look at Super Mario RPG for instance, Bowser was in it, and it was perfect.
snippet.textOriginal: Personally, I think Nintendo went wrong with this entire game. Like seriously, Mario and Luigi in his belly? What happened to the classic Mario & Luigi? Why can't we go back to that instead of changing all of this crap up? For me, the Babies ruined Partners in Time and for this one the entire story and not having M&L as the main characters kind of ruins it. If your going to make Bowser a playable character, DO IT RIGHT! Look at Super Mario RPG for instance, Bowser was in it, and it was perfect.

snippet.textDisplay:
Well, playable Bowser was surprisingly mediocre, Mario & Luigi's segments were quite monotonous, Fawful was completely ruined as a villain, the environments were all bland and lifeless, badges were made useless, etc.

I dunno, I don't mean to offend anyone, but I didn't like it. =\
snippet.textOriginal:
Well, playable Bowser was surprisingly mediocre, Mario & Luigi's segments were quite monotonous, Fawful was completely ruined as a villain, the environments were all bland and lifeless, badges were made useless, etc.

I dunno, I don't mean to offend anyone, but I didn't like it. =\

snippet.textDisplay: I really think this song was to overrated. I'm not saying it's bad but Mario and Luigi: Partners in Time's Final Boss song just had a better final boss theme. It really set the atmosphere for a final boss with a "This IS the final boss and all hope is lost." This one sounds like Happy Deathtime techno. But I have to admit I have listened to this song more than PiT's song. But PiT's FB Music had a better mood for a final boss than this one did. But I also never said that I didn't like this one!
snippet.textOriginal: I really think this song was to overrated. I'm not saying it's bad but Mario and Luigi: Partners in Time's Final Boss song just had a better final boss theme. It really set the atmosphere for a final boss with a "This IS the final boss and all hope is lost." This one sounds like Happy Deathtime techno. But I have to admit I have listened to this song more than PiT's song. But PiT's FB Music had a better mood for a final boss than this one did. But I also never said that I didn't like this one!

this game is actually very easy with observation to see the attack indicators and with good timing on the dodges/attacks/counters.
